item.name: 02_System_Health_Status
item.description: ðŸ¥ Health checksâ€”keep the backend from crashing, yo

exec: pm.test('All components green', () => { const json = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(json).to.have.all.keys('database', 'cache', 'ml_models', 'external_apis', 'weather_service'); Object.values(json).forEach(status => pm.expect(status).to.equal('healthy')); });

item.name: 03_Authentication_Users
item.description: ðŸ” User flowâ€”register, login, profiles, all that jazz

exec: pm.test('User ID saved', () => { const json = pm.response.json(); if (json.user?.id) { pm.collectionVariables.set('test_user_id', json.user.id); } });
pm.test('Token grabbed', () => { const json = pm.response.json(); if (json.access) { pm.collectionVariables.set('auth_token', json.access); console.log('Token yo!'); } });
